tweets.text: UPDATE - After the appeal we put out last night to @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup & @NESouthWest there was no nest destruction today at the River Otter Restoration Project in Devon and the partners are reconsidering their plans - thank you . Top work @WiseBirding et al . https://t.co/A8KSk5gcuE
@TBeetles @EnvAgency What is the point? Destruction for destructions sakeüò™
@EnvAgencyMids What the hell is that picture? This one is better, doesn't look capped to me, what are you trying to pull? https://t.co/mPkA00MuA3
@SwanwatchUk @NicolaBidgood @EnvAgencySW @ExeterCouncil https://t.co/Qrtl9ar8Fr

There are approx 220 chalk streams IN THE ENTIRE WORLD and Bury St Edmunds has two of them, the Lark and the Linnet. Chalk streams are rare and important habitats.

Here's a photo of the Lark today. #ChalkStreamsInCrisis https://t.co/gb6aJsmjbJ

Following the fire at a former waste site in #Telford last week our officers are also monitoring the #RiverSevern from south #Shrewsbury to north of #Gloucester to check for any environmental impacts

#Shropshire @TelfordWrekin @PHE_WestMids @shropsfire https://t.co/wb94TEmA0K

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.
